dict.acceptation: 垃圾；脏东西；丢弃的食物；无用的数据；

sent.orig: It expounds the essential earmark of garbage and the limitation of garbage function transformation: garbage classification.
sent.trans: 文章分析了垃圾的本质特征及垃圾功能转移的瓶颈——垃圾分类问题。

sent.orig: In computer science, garbage is generally classified into two types: semantic garbage and syntactic garbage.
sent.trans: 计算机科学中，无用信息一般分为两类：语义无用信息和句法无用信息。
错误的输入必然导致错误的输出。

sent.orig: Such projects as Gao'antun Garbage Burning Plant and Jiaojiapo Garbage Burying Ground will be completed.
sent.trans: 建成高安屯垃圾焚烧厂、焦家坡垃圾填埋厂等工程。

sent.orig: Please dispose all garbage into the garbage bin which placed inside the pantry.
sent.trans: 请将垃圾弃置于茶水间垃圾桶内。
